A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie took my childhood heroes; mocked\, and destroyed them.  This movie inserted politics into Star Wars and shoved them down my throat.  This is nothing more than a mockery of what Star Wars should be\, but is an insult to all Star Wars fans.  I'm done with this series\, in hopes that I can remember what Star Wars once was.  Thanks\, Disney...
